CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1945, pg. 21, reads: "FATHER MEETS SON - Hugh Smith, left greets his son, S1/c Alfred lee, 19, who has served 21 months in South Pacific. The waitress at Crawford Grill is Mary Stockton.  Alfred Lee will soon leave for Washington to spend some time with his mother before returning to his base. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Waitress Mary Stockton serving drink to Alfred Lee wearing U. S. Navy sailor uniform, with his father Hugh "Hughey" Smith seated on left, in Crawford Grill No. 1
